Methods in com.taursys.xml with parameters of type TriggerEvent

          Store value and fires parameter event if event has correct parameter name.
protected  void DispatchingContainer.processTriggerEvent(TriggerEvent e)
          Dispatches given TriggerEvent to children then notifies all TriggerListeners of event.

          Processes a given TriggerEvent.
protected  void Component.fireActionPerformed(TriggerEvent e)
